articles.title: Apple Has A 'Siri-Ous' Problem On Its Hands
articles.content: Apple struggles with AI delays for Siri, pressuring iPhone sales and valuation. See how these issues impact AAPL stock's growth and what it means for investors.

articles.title: BlackRock Large Cap Focus Growth V.I. Fund Q4 2024 Commentary
articles.content: The fund posted a return of 6.12% (Class I shares) for the fourth quarter of 2024. The largest exposures were in the IT, consumer discretionary, and communication services sectors.

articles.title: Tracking Bruce Berkowitz's Fairholme Portfolio - Q4 2024 Update
articles.content: Fairholme Fund has generated significant alpha since inception but underperformed in the last decade. Read here for key updates on the portfolio.

articles.title: Qualcomm: X85 Modem Has Arrived, Upgrade To 'Buy'
articles.content: Qualcomm unveiled its latest X85 modem on March 3, further extending its leadership in 5G and AI workload processing. Find out why QCOM stock is upgraded to buy.

articles.title: Qualcomm: A 'Buy' Despite The Risk Of Losing Apple
articles.content: Qualcomm's diversification into Automotive and IoT segments shows high growth potential. Read why I maintain my buy rating for QCOM stock.

articles.title: Qualcomm: Finally, It's Time To Put Apple Behind Us
articles.content: Qualcomm stock has remained resilient amid the recent selloff, and also outperformed Apple stock. Read why QCOM's gains might not be over.

articles.title: Apple loses German antitrust appeal, opening door for greater controls
articles.content: Applelost an appeal on Tuesday against a regulatory assessment thatopens the iPhone maker up to stricter controls in Germany, theFederal Court of Justice ruled on Tuesday, following years ofdebate...

articles.title: Magnificent-7 Q4 2024 Earnings Review: Growth Holds, But Rotation Awaits
articles.content: Q4 delivered another strong quarter for both top- and bottom-line growth, and it appears that analysts have become more precise in forecasting revenue for the group.
